import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'https://learning-management-system-using-reactjs-n0h1.onrender.com/api';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});// Batch API
export const batchAPI={getAll:params=>api.get('/batches',{params}),getById:id=>api.get("/batches/".concat(id)),create:data=>api.post('/batches',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/batches/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/batches/".concat(id)),toggleStatus:id=>api.patch("/batches/".concat(id,"/toggle-status"))};// Student API
export const studentAPI={getAll:params=>api.get('/students',{params}),getById:id=>api.get("/students/".concat(id)),getByBatch:batchId=>api.get("/students/batch/".concat(batchId)),create:data=>api.post('/students',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/students/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/students/".concat(id))};// Mark API
export const markAPI={getAll:params=>api.get('/marks',{params}),getById:id=>api.get("/marks/".concat(id)),getByStudent:studentId=>api.get("/marks/student/".concat(studentId)),getByBatch:batchId=>api.get("/marks/batch/".concat(batchId)),getStatistics:studentId=>api.get("/marks/statistics/".concat(studentId)),create:data=>api.post('/marks',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/marks/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/marks/".concat(id))};export default api;
